file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 72-35-00-02 - COMPRESSOR WHEELS - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL COMPRESSOR WHEELS - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to replace the compressor wheels. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY COMPRESSOR WHEELS - REPLACE- ALL 72-35-00-960-801-A MENT EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 72-35-00 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 72-35-00-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. COMPRESSOR WHEELS - REPLACEMENT A. General (1) To do this task, refer to the instructions given in Rolls-Royce Engine Manual CSP 31010. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-00-00-000-801-A/400 ENGINE - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-00-00-400-801-A/400 ENGINE - INSTALLATION Rolls-Royce Engine Manual CSP 31010 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the engine I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the engine. Refer to ( AMM TASK 71-00-00-000-801-A/400). J. Replace/Discard Compressor Wheels SUBTASK 960-002-A (1) Disassemble the compressor rotor. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce Engine Manual CSP 31010. (2) Discard the old compressor wheels. (3) Assemble the compressor rotor with the new compressor wheels. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce Engine Manual CSP 31010. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 72-35-00 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the engine. Refer to ( AMM TASK 71-00-00-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 72-35-00 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
